pkgmetadata.longdescription: ========web-poet========.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/web-poet.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/web-poet :alt: PyPI Version.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/web-poet.svg :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/web-poet :alt: Supported Python Versions.. image:: https://github.com/scrapinghub/web-poet/actions/workflows/tests-ubuntu.yml/badge.svg :target: https://github.com/scrapinghub/web-poet/actions/workflows/tests-ubuntu.yml :alt: Tox Ubuntu .. image:: https://github.com/scrapinghub/web-poet/actions/workflows/tests-windows.yml/badge.svg :target: https://github.com/scrapinghub/web-poet/actions/workflows/tests-windows.yml :alt: Tox Windows.. image:: https://codecov.io/github/scrapinghub/web-poet/coverage.svg?branch=master :target: https://codecov.io/gh/scrapinghub/web-poet :alt: Coverage report.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/web-poet/badge/?version=stable :target: https://web-poet.readthedocs.io/en/stable/?badge=stable :alt: Documentation Status.. intro starts``web-poet`` is a Python 3.8+ implementation of the `page object pattern`_ forweb scraping. It enables writing portable, reusable web parsing code... _page object pattern: https://martinfowler.com/bliki/PageObject.html.. intro endsSee the documentation_... _documentation: https://web-poet.readthedocs.ioDeveloping==========Setup your local Python environment via:1. `pip install -r requirements-dev.txt`2. `pre-commit install`Now everytime you perform a `git commit`, these tools will run against thestaged files:* `black`* `isort`* `flake8`You can also directly invoke `pre-commit run --all-files` or `tox -e linters`to run them without performing a commit.
